title: Bowen: Year of killing and broken assumptions has taken Middle East to edge of deeper, wider war
content: Twelve months on from the 7 October attacks which led to Israel's war in Gaza, our international editor says the region is on the edge of something even worse.
summary: Twelve months on from the 7 October attacks which led to Israel's war in Gaza, our international editor says the region is on the edge of something even worse.

title: Nobel Prize goes to microRNA researchers
content: US scientists Victor Ambros and Gary Ruvkun helped explain how genes work inside the human body.
summary: US scientists Victor Ambros and Gary Ruvkun helped explain how genes work inside the human body.

title: Drug-related killings shake French city of Marseille
content: Prosecutor says city faces "savagery" after taxi driver killed by 14-year-old and another child, 15, is stabbed to death.
summary: Prosecutor says city faces "savagery" after taxi driver killed by 14-year-old and another child, 15, is stabbed to death.

title: My son's not a monster, says Diddy's mother
content: Janice Combs says her son is "not perfect" but is not guilty of the sex charges filed against him.
summary: Janice Combs says her son is "not perfect" but is not guilty of the sex charges filed against him.

title: Blast kills two Chinese near Pakistan's Karachi airport
content: A third body, not yet officially identified, is thought to be that of the attacker, the BBC understands.

title: Spacecraft to launch towards knocked-off-course asteroid
content: The mission aims to re-visit the asteroid Nasa diverted when it crashed a probe into it.

title: Ethiopia president replaced after falling out with PM
content: Sahle-Work Zewde was the country's first female head of state - a largely ceremonial position.

title: Russia sentences 72-year-old American to jail on mercenary charges
content: Prosecutors said Stephen Hubbard was fighting on the Ukrainian side when he was captured by Russian forces in 2022.

title: Madonna pays heartfelt tribute to brother Christopher
content: The veteran star says her younger brother was the "closest thing to me for so long".

title: Ukraine strikes oil depot in occupied Crimea

title: Japan's government admits editing cabinet photo
content: A government spokesperson admitted "minor editing" had been made to the image after online speculation.

title: Mexican mayor murdered days after starting job
content: Alejandro Arcos is the second politician to be killed in a week in the city of Chilpachingo.
